description: Create a material transaction ticket generator.

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.validation: Must be one of Broker or MaterialSupplier.

permissions: Admins can create ticket generators. For Broker organizations, the user must be a broker member with practical manager access to that broker. For MaterialSupplier organizations, the user must be a manager member of the supplier or a member of the associated broker.
side_effects: Creates a material transaction ticket generator record.
validation_notes: --format-rule, --organization-type, and --organization-id are required. format_rule must be present. organization_type must be one of Broker or MaterialSupplier. organization_id must be unique within an organization_type.
